name: Dockcheck
description: Core Docker update checks with simple toggles.
author: mag37

form_fields.label: Automatic updates
form_fields.hint: If true, Dockcheck will pull updated images automatically; if false, it will only report what’s available.

form_fields.label: Max parallel checks
form_fields.hint: How many image checks to run in parallel. Increase for large fleets; default conserves resources.

form_fields.label: Min image age (days)
form_fields.hint: Skip images pulled more recently than this number of days to avoid re-updating fresh deployments.

form_fields.label: Exclude containers (comma-sep)
form_fields.hint: List container names to skip, separated by commas (e.g. "nginx,db,portainer").

form_fields.label: Only update if label present
form_fields.hint: Only update containers that have this label set; leave empty to update all.

form_fields.label: Auto-prune images
form_fields.hint: If true, removes dangling images after updates to reclaim disk space.

form_fields.label: Extra dockcheck flags
form_fields.hint: Any additional flags for dockcheck.sh; leave empty for none.
